item.title: 苹果客服回应湿巾擦拭 iPhone 17 Pro Max 掉色：高浓度酒精确有可能掉漆
item.guid: 苹果客服回应湿巾擦拭-iPhone-17-Pro-Max-掉色：高浓度酒精确有可能掉漆
item.description:
Yesterday, the iPhone 17 Pro Max in Starlight Orange color became a trending topic due to a widespread discoloration problem after being wiped with a wet wipe, sparking widespread discussion. 昨天，iPhone 17 Pro Max 星宇橙配色因被湿巾擦拭后出现大面积掉色问题登上热搜，引发广泛讨论。

It is understood that the issue was first disclosed on November 15, when blogger Zen (@Rui35052730) posted on X with accompanying pictures, stating that his iPhone 17 Pro Max had paint peeling, revealing a large area of the original aluminum color, after being wiped with a "wet wipe". 据了解，该问题首次被披露是在 11 月 15 日，博主 Zen（@Rui35052730）在 X 上发表贴文并配图称其 iPhone 17 Pro Max 在使用「湿巾」擦拭后掉漆，露出大面积铝金属原色。

However, some netizens supplemented relevant information in the comments section of the post, stating that the claim "wet wipes cause paint peeling on the 'Starlight Orange' iPhone 17 Pro Max" is misleading. 而有网友在相关帖子下补充相关信息称，「湿巾使『星宇橙』配色的 iPhone 17 Pro Max 掉漆」这一说法存在误导性。

The netizen believes that this phenomenon is not caused by "ordinary" wet wipes, but rather by stronger chemical substances (such as bleach) stripping the anodized layer. Specific information about the wet wipes is missing, and Apple officially recommends using 70% isopropyl alcohol wipes for cleaning. 该网友认为，该现象并非「普通」的湿巾造成，而是有更强的化学物质（如漂白剂）剥离了阳极氧化层，关于湿巾的具体信息缺失，而苹果官方建议使用 70% 异丙醇湿巾进行擦拭。

Apple customer service responded that wiping with ordinary wet wipes or tap water will not affect the body color, but if wet wipes containing high concentrations of alcohol or other corrosive liquids are used, paint peeling may occur. 苹果客服回应称，普通湿巾或自来水擦拭不会影响机身颜色，但若使用含高浓度酒精或其他腐蚀性液体的湿巾，则可能导致掉漆。

It is worth noting that in October, a user had already reported on the Reddit forum that the Starlight Orange back cover turned "rose gold," with the aluminum surface almost completely faded. 值得注意的是，在此前的 10 月已有用户在 Reddit 论坛反馈，星宇橙后盖变「玫瑰金」，铝合金表面几乎完全褪色。

Foreign media Wccftech analyzed in previous reports that this issue may be related to manufacturing process defects, possibly due to the anodic oxidation protective layer not being completely sealed, leading to aluminum exposure to air and subsequent oxidation and discoloration. 外媒 Wccftech 在先前的报道中分析认为，该问题或与生产工艺缺陷相关，可能因阳极氧化保护层未完全密封，导致铝材暴露在空气中发生氧化变色。

This generation of iPhone 17 Pro series abandoned the previous titanium material, opting instead for a unibody aluminum alloy frame, which the official statement claims is to achieve lightweight and robust construction. 本代 iPhone 17 Pro 系列放弃了前代钛金属材质，转而采用一体成型铝合金机身，官方称此举是为了实现轻量化与坚固结构。

item.title: Google 正式发布 Gemini 3
item.guid: Google-正式发布-Gemini-3
item.description:
Early this morning, Google DeepMind officially released its new generation flagship model, Gemini 3, which boasts the most advanced reasoning capabilities, world-leading multimodal understanding, and support for a new intelligent coding experience. 今天凌晨，Google DeepMind 正式发布新一代旗舰模型 Gemini 3，号称拥有最先进的推理能力、世界领先的多模态理解能力，并支持新的智能编码体验。

The initial release version is Gemini 3 Pro, and it is being rolled out globally starting today, with highlights as follows: 本次首发版本为 Gemini 3 Pro，并且即日起开始全球范围内推出，亮点如下：

    Gemini 3 Pro preview version with native multimodal support (text, image, video, audio)

    Topped the LMArena leaderboard, leading across mainstream tests in reasoning, multimodal, and programming.

    Record-breaking reasoning capabilities (GPQA Diamond 91.9%, MathArena Apex 23.4%)

    Offers Deep Think mode (to be available in the coming weeks)

    1 million token context window + 64K output

    Introduces new AI IDE: Google Antigravity, with the new model integrated with tools like Cursor, GitHub, and JetBrains.

It's worth noting that in terms of reasoning capabilities, Gemini 3 Pro achieved a doctoral-level reasoning score of 37.5% in 'Humanity's Last Exam'. 值得一提的是， 推理能力方面， Gemini 3 Pro 在「人类最后的考试（Humanity’s Last Exam）」中拿到了 37.5% 的博士级推理成绩。

Interestingly, OpenAI CEO Sam Altman also just posted on the X platform, saying: 'Congrats to Google on the successful launch of Gemini 3!! Looks like a great model.' Elon Musk, meanwhile, commented 'Well done'. 有趣的是，OpenAI CEO Sam Altman 刚刚也在 X 平台发文称：「恭喜 Google 成功推出 Gemini 3!！看起来是个很棒的模型。」而马斯克则是表示「做得好」。

item.title: 小米 Q3 财报：净利创新高，电动汽车与 AI 首次盈利
item.guid: 小米-Q3-财报：净利创新高，电动汽车与-AI-首次盈利
item.description:
Yesterday, Xiaomi Group announced its Q3 2025 financial report, showing an adjusted net profit surge of 80.9% year-on-year, reaching a new historical high, with smart electric vehicles and AI and other innovative businesses achieving single-quarter operating profitability for the first time. 昨天，小米集团公布了 2025 年第三季度财报，显示经调整净利润同比大增 80.9%，创下历史新高、智能电动汽车及 AI 等创新业务首次实现单季经营盈利。

    Total revenue was RMB 113.1 billion, a year-on-year increase of 22.3%; adjusted net profit was RMB 11.3 billion, significantly exceeding market expectations. Operating profit reached RMB 15.11 billion;

    Revenue from smart electric vehicles and AI and other innovative businesses reached RMB 29 billion, achieving single-quarter profitability for the first time . New car deliveries for the quarter were 108,796 units, with Xiaomi YU7 ranking first in China's SUV market sales in October.

    Xiaomi's smartphone shipments were 43.3 million units, growing year-on-year for 9 consecutive quarters, maintaining a global market share of 13.6%, and ranking among the top three for 21 consecutive quarters. Sales in mainland China ranked second, with a market share of 16.7%;

    The AIoT platform connected devices exceeded 1 billion units, with monthly active users reaching 742 million, and internet service revenue also hit a new high of RMB 9.4 billion;

    Q3 R&D investment was RMB 9.1 billion, a year-on-year increase of 52.1%, and the R&D personnel scale increased to 24,871 people. The company's layout in the AI field is gradually becoming clear, including large voice models and whole-house smart solutions, demonstrating its long-term investment and strategic commitment to the technology ecosystem.

Lu Weibing, Partner and President of Xiaomi Group, revealed during the earnings call that Xiaomi Auto is expected to complete its annual delivery target of 350,000 units for the full year this week. 小米集团合伙人、集团总裁卢伟冰在业绩电话会上透露，小米汽车预计将于本周完成全年 35 万辆的年度交付目标。

Lu Weibing also responded to the issue of rising storage costs. He pointed out that the current increase in memory prices is a long-cycle behavior, primarily driven by the surge in HBM demand brought about by AI, rather than cyclical fluctuations in the traditional mobile phone and laptop industries. 卢伟冰还就目前存储成本攀升的问题作出了回应。他指出，当前内存价格上涨属于长周期行为，主要驱动力来自 AI 带来的 HBM 需求激增，而非传统手机、笔记本行业的周期波动。

Lu Weibing revealed that Xiaomi has signed full-year supply agreements with partners for 2026 in advance to ensure stable supply. He also stated that future cost pressures might be balanced through product price increases and structural upgrades. 卢伟冰透露，小米已提前与合作伙伴签订 2026 年全年供应协议，以确保供应稳定。 他同时表示，未来可能通过产品涨价及结构升级来平衡成本压力。

In addition, Xiaomi Auto announced yesterday that its end-to-end assisted driving "Xiaomi HAD Enhanced Edition" will officially debut at 9 AM this Friday at the Guangzhou Auto Show, where Li Xiaoshuang, Vice President of Xiaomi Auto, will introduce the latest developments. 另外，小米汽车在昨日宣布，其端到端辅助驾驶「Xiaomi HAD 增强版」将于本周五早 9 点在广州车展正式亮相，届时小米汽车副总裁李肖爽将介绍最新进展。

Public data shows that after Xiaomi Auto officially announced its car manufacturing plans in 2021, it continuously increased investment in autonomous driving R&D technology began road testing in 2022, and R&D investment increased to 4.7 billion yuan in 2023, with the team size exceeding a thousand people. 公开资料显示，小米汽车在 2021 年官宣造车后，持续加大自动驾驶研发投入；2022 年技术开始上路测试，2023 年研发投入增至 47 亿元，团队规模突破千人。

It is reported that the "10 Million Clips" version collects video segments through multi-modal sensors such as lidar, cameras, and millimeter-wave radar, forming a large-scale dataset, making the vehicle control process more natural and smooth, and the driving experience closer to that of experienced drivers. The Xiaomi YU7 model has fully adopted this version, and the SU7 series is also gradually being covered. 据悉，「1000 万 Clips」版本通过激光雷达、摄像头、毫米波雷达等多模态传感器采集视频片段，形成规模化数据集，使控车过程更自然流畅，驾乘体验更接近资深司机。小米 YU7 车型已全系搭载该版本，SU7 系列也在逐步覆盖。

item.title: 苹果 iPhone Air 设计师离职，投身 AI 初创公司
item.guid: 苹果-iPhone-Air-设计师离职，投身-AI-初创公司
item.description:
According to Bloomberg, Apple industrial designer Abidur Chowdhury has recently resigned to join an AI startup. 据彭博社报道，苹果工业设计师阿比杜尔 · 乔杜里（Abidur Chowdhury）已于近日离职，加入一家 AI 初创公司。

He was not only one of the main designers of the iPhone Air but also served as an introductory character in its launch video. 他不仅是 iPhone Air 的主要设计者之一，还在发布视频中担任介绍角色。

It is reported that the designer joined Apple in 2019, just as former design chief Jony Ive was leaving. 据悉，这位设计师于 2019 年进入苹果，正值前设计主管 Jony Ive 离开之际。

He worked at Apple for over 6 years, during which he participated in the design of several core products and appeared at the September launch event this year, introducing the design philosophy and manufacturing process of the new iPhone Air. 他在苹果任职超过 6 年，期间参与了多项核心产品的设计，并在今年 9 月的发布会上亮相，介绍了新款 iPhone Air 的设计理念与工艺流程。

Chowdhury's departure has drawn attention within Apple. Sources say his exit is unrelated to the iPhone Air's market performance; although the model received positive design reviews, sales fell short of expectations. The report also indicates that Apple plans to launch the second-generation iPhone Air in 2027. 乔杜里的离职在苹果内部引发关注。消息人士称，他的离开与 iPhone Air 的市场表现无关，该机型虽在设计上获得好评，但销量不及预期。报道还指出，苹果计划在 2027 年推出第二代 iPhone Air。

In recent years, Apple's design team has undergone significant changes. Following Jony Ive's departure, most team members have either retired or moved to other companies, including LoveFrom, founded by Ive. 近年来，苹果设计团队经历了显著变动。继 Jony Ive 离职后，团队成员大多已退休或转投其他公司，包括 Ive 创立的 LoveFrom。

Meanwhile, Jeff Williams, the COO long responsible for the design team, also announced his departure last week. Apple confirmed in July this year that the design team would report directly to CEO Tim Cook. 与此同时，长期负责设计团队的 COO Jeff Williams 上周也宣布离职。苹果在今年 7 月确认，设计团队将直接向 CEO Tim Cook 汇报。

Before joining Apple, Chowdhury earned a Bachelor's degree in Product Design and Technology from Loughborough University in the UK and received multiple honors, including the Red Dot Design Award. 乔杜里在加入苹果前，曾在英国拉夫堡大学取得产品设计与技术学士学位，并获得红点设计奖等多项荣誉。

His professional experience includes Cambridge Consultants, Curventa, Layer Design, and his self-founded Abidur Chowdhury Design consulting business. This move to an AI startup indicates a new phase in his career path. 他的职业经历涵盖剑桥顾问公司、Curventa、Layer 设计公司，以及个人创办的 Abidur Chowdhury Design 咨询业务。此次转向 AI 初创公司，显示其职业路径正迎来新的阶段。

item.title: 俞敏洪连发 10 条南极视频，人均 30 万元豪华邮轮行程曝光
item.guid: 俞敏洪连发-10-条南极视频，人均-30-万元豪华邮轮行程曝光
item.description:
Yesterday, Yu Minhong, founder and chairman of New Oriental, posted 10 Antarctic travel videos on social media, featuring attractions such as the Drake Passage. He added in the comments: "There was no signal for the past few days; this video was made four days ago." 昨天，新东方创始人、董事长俞敏洪在社交平台连发 10 条南极旅行视频，内容涉及德雷克海峡等景点。他在评论区补充道：「前几天一直没有什么信号，这个视频是四天前做的。」

The video revealed that he was aboard the "Le Commandant Charcot" cruise ship, a 20-day journey starting from Paris, with an average cost of about 300,000 yuan per person. The cruise ship only returns to Antarctica every two years, with the next trip expected in 2027. 视频透露，他乘坐的是「夏古号」邮轮，该行程从巴黎出发，历时 20 天，人均费用约 30 万元。 该邮轮每两年才返回南极，下一次预计在 2027 年。

Previously, Yu Minhong published an internal letter celebrating the company's 32nd anniversary while traveling in Antarctica and continuously updated 10 Antarctic travel videos on social media, sparking widespread controversy. 此前，俞敏洪在南极旅行期间发布公司成立 32 周年内部信，并在社交平台连续更新 10 条南极游视频，引发广泛争议。

On November 16, Yu Minhong delivered an anniversary message from Antarctica, themed "Perseverance in Ice and Snow," describing the Antarctic scenery and using the mutual aid of penguins to symbolize the New Oriental team spirit. 11 月 16 日，俞敏洪在南极发布周年寄语，以「冰雪中的坚守」为主题，描绘南极风光并借企鹅互助类比新东方团队精神。

However, the letter was questioned by employees with the sentiment "the boss is in Antarctica, and we are working overtime," failing to achieve the desired resonance. 然而，该信件被员工质疑「老板在南极，我们在加班」 ，未能收获预期共鸣。

Some employees joked on social media, "Tonight, all xdfer (New Oriental employees) are Antarctic people," and pointed out that Yu Minhong repeatedly emphasized "I" and "Antarctica" in the letter, but rarely mentioned the real pressures faced by employees. 部分员工在社交平台调侃「今夜，所有 xdfer（新东方员工）都是南极人」，并指出俞敏洪在信中多次强调「我」与「南极」，却鲜少提及员工的现实压力。

Guancha.cn cited financial data indicating that New Oriental's net profit plummeted by 73.7% to $7.1 million in the fourth quarter of fiscal year 2025, primarily due to the drag from its Oriental Selection business and goodwill impairment. 观察者网援引财务数据指出，新东方在 2025 财年第四季度净利润骤降 73.7% 至 710 万美元，主要受东方甄选业务拖累及商誉减值影响。

At the same time, the growth rate of the core education business declined from 43.9% in the previous fiscal year to 13.6%, and the company is still under transformation pressure. 同时，核心教育业务增速由上一财年的 43.9% 下滑至 13.6%，公司仍处于转型压力之中。

item.title: Anthropic 购买 300 亿美元的 Azure 计算资源
item.guid: Anthropic-购买-300-亿美元的-Azure-计算资源
item.description:
Last night, Anthropic announced that it will use Microsoft Azure's Nvidia GPUs to train new Claude models and use Azure to host Claude models. 昨晚，Anthropic 发文宣布，将使用微软 Azure 的英伟达 GPU 训练 Claude 新模型，并使用 Azure 托管 Claude 模型。

Anthropic stated that Claude has now been migrated to Azure hosting. Anthropic will commit to purchasing 30 billion computing power in this plan. Anthropic 表示，Claude 现已迁移至 Azure 托管。Anthropic 将在本次计划中承诺购买 300 亿算力。

In addition, Nvidia and Microsoft will invest $10 billion and $5 billion in Anthropic, respectively, and Nvidia and Anthropic will collaborate on design and engineering. 另外，英伟达和微软将分别向 Anthropic 投资 100 亿美元和 50 亿美元，同时英伟达与 Anthropic 将在设计和工程方面展开合作。

item.title: Cloudflare 全球故障引发大规模宕机，X 与 ChatGPT 受波及
item.guid: Cloudflare-全球故障引发大规模宕机，X-与-ChatGPT-受波及
item.description:
According to multiple media reports, late last night, global network infrastructure provider Cloudflare experienced a serious technical malfunction , leading to widespread outages for multiple websites, including social media platform X, AI service ChatGPT, and music streaming platform Spotify. 据多家媒体报道， 昨天深夜，全球网络基础设施服务商 Cloudflare 发生严重技术故障 ，导致包括社交媒体平台 X、AI 服务 ChatGPT、音乐流媒体平台 Spotify 在内的多个网站大规模宕机。

This incident has drawn widespread attention from global users, with thousands reporting service access issues through the monitoring platform Downdetector. 此次事件引发全球用户广泛关注，数千人通过监测平台 Downdetector 报告无法访问服务的情况。

Cloudflare stated that the outage stemmed from an "unusual surge in traffic," causing errors in some traffic transmitted through its network. Cloudflare 表示，故障源于「异常流量激增」，导致部分经由其网络传输的流量出现错误。

The company confirmed internal service degradation on its system status page and emphasized that it is working hard to restore services. While some services have gradually recovered, users may still observe higher-than-normal error rates. 公司在系统状态页面确认内部服务降级，并强调正在全力恢复。虽然部分服务已逐步恢复，但用户仍可能观察到高于正常水平的错误率。

The affected scope also includes dating app Grindr, design platform Canva, game "League of Legends," and movie review site Letterboxd, among others. This outage is similar to several global failures of the Cloudflare system in recent years, highlighting its critical position in global internet infrastructure. 受影响的范围还涉及交友应用 Grindr、设计平台 Canva、游戏《英雄联盟》以及影评网站 Letterboxd 等。此次宕机与过去几年 Cloudflare 系统多次出现的全球性故障相似，凸显其在全球互联网基础设施中的关键地位。

It is worth noting that not long ago, Cloudflare just announced the acquisition of AI platform Replicate, planning to build its Worker platform into a core tool for AI application deployment. This strategic move stands in stark contrast to the sudden outage, showing that the company still faces technical stability challenges while expanding its business. 值得注意的是，就在不久前，Cloudflare 刚宣布收购 AI 平台 Replicate，计划将其 Worker 平台打造为 AI 应用部署的核心工具。这一战略动作与突发故障形成鲜明对比，显示公司在扩展业务的同时仍面临技术稳定性挑战。

item.title: 机构：苹果 10 月在华销量同比激增 37%
item.guid: 机构：苹果-10-月在华销量同比激增-37%
item.description:
According to Jiemian News, market research firm Counterpoint Research released its latest monitoring data yesterday, showing that Apple's smartphone sales in the Chinese market surged by 37% year-on-year in October, with its market share climbing to 25%, breaking the quarter-mark for the first time since 2022. 据界面新闻报道，昨天市场研究机构 Counterpoint Research 发布最新监测数据显示， 10 月苹果在中国智能手机市场销量同比激增 37%，市场份额攀升至 25%，为自 2022 年以来首次突破四分之一关口。

Among them, the iPhone 17 series contributed over 80% of sales , with double-digit growth achieved across all models, from the iPhone 17 priced at 5999 yuan to the iPhone 17 Pro Max at 9999 yuan, driving an overall 8% year-on-year rebound in the Chinese smartphone market. 其中， iPhone 17 系列贡献超过 80% 的销量 ，从售价 5999 元的 iPhone 17 到 9999 元的 iPhone 17 Pro Max 均实现两位数增长，带动中国智能手机市场整体同比回升 8%。

Analysis indicates that October coincided with the Mid-Autumn Festival and National Day holidays, leading to a concentrated release of consumer demand, which created a favorable environment for the iPhone 17 series. 分析指出，10 月恰逢中秋与国庆假期叠加，消费需求集中释放，为 iPhone 17 系列创造了有利环境。

Previously, in the third quarter of 2025, overall smartphone shipments in the Chinese market decreased by 0.6% year-on-year, with vivo ranking first with a 17.3% share, and Apple and Huawei ranking second and third with 15.8% and 15.2% respectively. 此前，2025 年第三季度中国智能手机市场整体出货量同比下降 0.6%，vivo 以 17.3% 的份额居首，苹果和华为分别以 15.8% 与 15.2% 位列二、三位。

However, after entering October, Apple achieved a "cornering overtake" with the explosive power of its new products, and its market share far exceeded the third-quarter level. 然而，进入 10 月后，苹果凭借新品爆发力实现「弯道超车」，市场份额远超三季度水平。

In the high-end market above 6000 yuan, Apple leads with a 51.1% share, Huawei holds 30.7%, and the penetration rate of the iPhone 17 series has reached 69%. 在 6000 元以上高端市场，苹果以 51.1% 的份额领跑，华为占据 30.7%，iPhone 17 系列渗透率已达 69%。

Counterpoint analyst Ivan Lam stated that a higher average selling price will further amplify Apple's revenue growth, and its market share is expected to continue to consolidate in the fourth quarter. Counterpoint 分析师 Ivan Lam 表示，更高的平均售价将进一步放大苹果营收增长，预计第四季度市场份额将持续巩固。

The report cited supply chain data, indicating that Apple has planned sufficient production capacity for the iPhone 17 series, with an estimated production of 54 million units in the third quarter, expected to increase to 79 million units in the fourth quarter, and a total annual production estimated to reach 133 million units. 报道援引产业链数据指出，苹果为 iPhone 17 系列规划了充足产能，第三季度产量约 5400 万部，第四季度预计提升至 7900 万部，全年总产量预计达 1.33 亿部。

In the two key markets of the United States and China, sales of the iPhone 17 series have increased by 14% compared to the iPhone 16 in the same period last year. 在美国和中国两大关键市场，iPhone 17 系列销量已较去年同期的 iPhone 16 增长 14%。

Apple's latest financial report shows that total revenue in the fourth quarter reached $102.47 billion, a year-on-year increase of 7.9%, setting a new historical high for the same period; net profit surged by 86% to $27.47 billion, with the significant increase in iPhone 17 series sales contributing significantly. However, revenue in Greater China was $14.493 billion, a year-on-year decrease of 3.6%, making it the only region globally to experience a decline. 苹果最新财报显示，第四季度总营收达 1024.7 亿美元，同比增长 7.9%，创同期历史新高；净利润飙升 86% 至 274.7 亿美元，其中 iPhone 17 系列销量激增贡献显著。不过，大中华区营收为 144.93 亿美元，同比下降 3.6%，成为全球唯一出现下滑的区域。

Market analysts believe that with the arrival of the year-end consumption peak season and ample supply, sales of the iPhone 17 series in the Chinese market are expected to reach new highs. 市场分析人士认为，随着年底消费旺季来临，叠加供应充足，iPhone 17 系列在中国市场的销量有望再创新高。

item.title: 百度公布 Q3 财报：「萝卜快跑」全球出行突破 1700 万次，AI 成最大增长点
item.guid: 百度公布-Q3-财报：「萝卜快跑」全球出行突破-1700-万次，AI-成最大增长点
item.description:
Yesterday, Baidu released its Q3 2025 financial report, showing its continued rapid growth in the AI business sector. 昨天，百度公布了公司 2025 年 Q3 财报，显示其在 AI 业务领域保持高速增长。

Total revenue for the third quarter reached 31.2 billion yuan, with Baidu Core revenue at 24.7 billion yuan. Notably, AI business revenue grew by over 50% year-on-year, becoming a key driver for overall performance. 三季度总营收达 312 亿元，其中百度核心营收为 247 亿元。值得关注的是，AI 业务收入同比增长超过 50%，成为推动整体业绩的关键动力。

    AI Cloud business revenue increased by 33% year-on-year, with high-performance computing infrastructure subscription revenue significantly up by 128% year-on-year, and AI application revenue reaching 2.6 billion yuan;

    AI native marketing service revenue reached 2.8 billion yuan, a year-on-year increase of 262%;

    Autonomous driving service "Apollo Go" recorded 3.1 million global rides in Q3, a year-on-year increase of 212%; weekly fully driverless orders exceeded 250,000 in October; as of November, cumulative global rides surpassed 17 million, covering 22 cities worldwide, with a total autonomous driving mileage exceeding 240 million kilometers.

In addition, Baidu recently officially released Wenxin Big Model 5.0, a unified native full-modal model, which has shown outstanding performance in understanding, creative writing, agent planning, and instruction following. Baidu stated that it will continue to drive AI innovation and solidify its leadership position in the AI era. 此外，百度近期正式发布文心大模型 5.0，作为统一的原生全模态模型，在理解、创意写作、智能体规划与指令遵循等方面表现突出。百度表示将继续推动 AI 创新，巩固其在 AI 时代的领导地位。

item.title: 爱奇艺三季度亏损加剧，CEO：将依靠 AI 推动创新

    Content distribution revenue was RMB 640 million;

iQIYI CEO Gong Yu stated that the recent success of drama series highlights the company's capabilities in high-quality content production and IP value amplification, emphasizing that the company is driving innovation in content creation and consumption through AI technology. 爱奇艺 CEO 龚宇表示，近期剧集的成功凸显了公司在高质量内容生产和 IP 价值放大方面的能力，并强调公司正在通过 AI 技术推动内容创作与消费的革新。

Meanwhile, CFO Wang Jun pointed out that overseas business has achieved steady growth in recent quarters, and the company continues to maintain a leading share of drama viewing in the domestic market. 同时，CFO 王俊指出，海外业务在近几个季度实现稳健增长，公司在国内市场继续保持剧集观看份额的领先地位。

item.title: 西贝回应门店一线员工普遍涨薪 500 元
item.guid: 西贝回应门店一线员工普遍涨薪-500-元
item.description:
According to 21st Century Business Herald, Xibei Catering Group announced that starting from September, it would increase the average monthly salary of frontline store employees by 500 yuan per person and establish a "grievance award" subsidy to address the cyberbullying and abusive phone calls some employees have faced, following the "Xibei Luo Yonghao incident." 据 21 世纪经济报道，西贝餐饮集团在「西贝罗永浩风波」后宣布，自 9 月起对门店一线员工平均涨薪 500 元/人/月，并设立「委屈奖」补贴，以应对部分员工遭遇的网络暴力和辱骂电话。

The report noted that Xibei held an employee meeting on September 12, where CEO Jia Guolong announced a 500 yuan subsidy for frontline employees. This subsidy was paid in September and was integrated into the bonus system in October, becoming a fixed part of the income structure. 报道指出，西贝曾于 9 月 12 日召开员工大会，CEO 贾国龙宣布向一线员工发放 500 元补贴，该补贴已在 9 月到账，并在 10 月转入奖金体系，固定保留在收入结构中。

Xibei's public relations department further explained that the 500 yuan starting from September is a general salary increase, not a "grievance award." Starting from October, bonuses will fluctuate between 300 and 800 yuan based on performance evaluations, and each store will also select 4 to 6 "Most Beautiful Xibei People," with bonuses ranging from approximately 400 to 800 yuan. 西贝公关部进一步解释，9 月起的 500 元为普遍涨薪，而非「委屈奖」。 10 月起奖金根据考核浮动在 300 至 800 元之间，每家门店还会评选 4 至 6 名「最美西贝人」，奖金约 400 至 800 元不等。

In addition, Xibei also set up "skill bonuses" and "competition rewards" to encourage employees to improve service skills and overall store performance. It is reported that employees at the Blue Harbor store in Beijing's Chaoyang District received an average of 1,000 yuan per person, totaling 41,500 yuan, in October. 此外，西贝还设立「技能奖金」与「赛场奖励」，鼓励员工提升服务技能与门店整体表现。据悉，北京朝阳区蓝色港湾店员工在 10 月获得人均 1000 元、总计 4.15 万元的奖励。

The company emphasized that it would not lay off employees or reduce shifts due to the turmoil, and would restore customer traffic through measures such as price reductions on dishes and consumer coupons. Currently, customer traffic at Xibei's offline stores has gradually recovered. 公司强调，不会因风波裁员或减排班，并通过菜品降价、消费券等措施恢复客流。目前，西贝线下门店客流量已逐步回升。

item.title: 马斯克讽刺「跟屁虫」，贝索斯 AI 项目引热议
item.guid: 马斯克讽刺「跟屁虫」，贝索斯-AI-项目引热议
item.description:
According to The New York Times, former Amazon CEO Jeff Bezos announced his return to the tech sector with $6.2 billion (approximately 44.7 billion RMB) in funding to launch an AI project called "Project Prometheus." 据纽约时报报道，前亚马逊 CEO 杰夫 · 贝索斯（Jeff Bezos）宣布以 62 亿美元（约合人民币 447 亿元）融资重返科技赛道，启动名为「普罗米修斯计划」的 AI 项目。

The project aims to push AI from the virtual world to the physical world by establishing a super-large automated laboratory where robots conduct physics, chemistry, and engineering experiments 24 hours a day. AI will propose hypotheses, design experiments, and iterate optimizations like a scientist. 该计划旨在推动 AI 从虚拟世界走向物理世界，通过建立超大型自动化实验室，让机器人 24 小时进行物理、化学与工程实验，AI 将像科学家一样提出假设、设计实验并迭代优化。

After stepping down as Amazon CEO in 2021, Bezos faded from the spotlight for a time, but chose to make a comeback four years later, personally investing a huge sum of money. 贝索斯在 2021 年卸任亚马逊 CEO 后一度淡出一线，但四年后选择复出，并亲自投入巨额资金。

Currently, Prometheus has launched a "talent grab" in Silicon Valley, recruiting nearly 100 top researchers from OpenAI, Google DeepMind, and Meta. 目前，普罗米修斯已在硅谷展开「人才大抢购」，吸纳近 100 名来自 OpenAI、Google DeepMind 和 Meta 的顶级研究员。

Its target areas include aerospace, automotive engineering, and computer hardware manufacturing, such as large-scale wind tunnel simulations in aerospace and optimizing robot production line collaboration in automotive manufacturing. 其目标领域包括航空航天、汽车工程与计算机硬件制造，如在航空领域进行大规模风洞模拟、在汽车制造中优化机器人产线协作等。

Bezos's co-CEO, Vic Bajaj, was a core member of Google X, participating in the drone delivery project Wing and the autonomous driving project Waymo, and later founded Verily, a life sciences company under Alphabet. This move is seen as providing technical and strategic assurance for Prometheus. 而贝索斯的联合 CEO 维克 · 巴贾杰曾是 Google X 的核心成员，参与无人机送货项目 Wing 和自动驾驶项目 Waymo，后创立 Alphabet 旗下生命科学公司 Verily。此举被视为为普罗米修斯提供技术与战略保障。

It is worth noting that after the news broke, Musk retweeted on X, mocking Bezos as a "Copy Cat" and igniting public opinion with a cat emoji "🐈". 值得注意的是，在消息传出后，马斯克在 X 上转发推文，并讽刺贝索斯为「跟屁虫（Copy Cat）」，以一个猫咪 emoji「🐈」点燃了舆论。

Musk believes that Bezos's foray into physical AI and robotics is "copying" Tesla's path. 马斯克认为贝索斯进军物理 AI 与机器人领域是在「抄袭」特斯拉的路线。

The two have had a long-standing rivalry, with their feuds lasting twenty years, from satellite internet to rocket launches and autonomous driving. Despite this, Musk still sent his congratulations after Bezos's Blue Origin New Glenn rocket successfully launched. 两人长期存在竞争关系，从卫星互联网到火箭发射再到自动驾驶，互怼已持续二十年。尽管如此，马斯克在贝索斯旗下蓝色起源新格伦号火箭成功发射后仍送上祝福。

🔗 Related reading: The two richest people in the world are arguing! Bezos raises 44.7 billion to make a comeback in AI, Musk: Copy Cat 🔗 相关阅读： 两个世界首富吵起来了！贝索斯融资 447 亿复出搞 AI，马斯克：跟屁虫

item.title: 字节跳动整合技术团队成立中国交易与广告部
item.guid: 字节跳动整合技术团队成立中国交易与广告部
item.description:
According to Phoenix News, ByteDance has completed the integration of its commercialization, e-commerce, and local life service technology teams, establishing the China Transaction and Advertising Department, led by Wang Fengkun, the head of Douyin's local life service technology. This structure officially took effect yesterday. 据凤凰网报道，字节跳动已完成商业化、电商及生活服务技术团队的整合，成立中国交易与广告部，由抖音生活服务技术负责人王奉坤负责。该架构已于昨天正式生效。

Public information shows that Wang Fengkun is an early ByteDance employee who participated in building the Ocean Engine and Pangolin advertising systems, and later transferred to the real estate business and local life service sectors. 公开信息显示，王奉坤为字节早期员工，曾参与搭建巨量引擎与穿山甲广告系统，后转岗至房产业务及生活服务板块。

He received his Bachelor's and Master's degrees in computer science from Beihang University in 2007 and 2010, respectively, and previously served as the server-side technical lead at NetEase Youdao Cloud Note. 他于 2007 年和 2010 年分别取得北航计算机学士与硕士学位，曾在网易有道云笔记担任服务端技术负责人。

In other news, Chen Songlin, the former head of Douyin's e-commerce technology, has transferred to the TikTok e-commerce technology department. Chen Songlin previously worked at Baidu and joined ByteDance in 2014, serving as the head of the user growth platform and Douyin's e-commerce technology. 另有消息，原抖音电商技术负责人陈松林已转岗至 TikTok 电商技术部门。陈松林曾在百度任职，2014 年加入字节，历任用户增长中台及抖音电商技术负责人。

According to official introductions, the China Transaction and Advertising Department will rely on products such as Douyin, Toutiao, Xigua Video, and Tomato Novel, combining personalized recommendation, deep learning, and large model technologies to build the core revenue business algorithms and engineering architecture for e-commerce, local life services, and advertising marketing. 据官方介绍，中国交易与广告部将依托抖音、今日头条、西瓜视频、番茄小说等产品，结合个性化推荐、深度学习与大模型技术，构建电商、生活服务及广告营销的核心营收业务算法与工程架构。

item.title: 夸克全面接入千问助手，将发布全新 AI 浏览器

item.description:
Yesterday, on the second day of Alibaba's Qianwen APP public beta, Quark App announced its full integration with the Qianwen conversational assistant. Users can swipe right within the Quark App to directly use Qianwen's dialogue function. 昨天，在阿里巴巴千问 APP 开启公测的第二天，夸克 App 宣布全面接入千问对话助手。用户在夸克 App 内右滑，即可直接使用千问的对话功能。

Insiders revealed that Quark is positioned as an "AI browser" and will form a strategic synergy with the Qianwen APP. Alibaba stated that the world-leading Qwen model will provide underlying AI service guarantees for the Qianwen APP and Quark. Since its full open-sourcing in 2023, Qwen has surpassed models like Llama and Deepseek, becoming one of the most powerful and widely used open-source large models globally. 阿里方面表示，全球领先的 Qwen 模型将为千问 APP 和夸克提供底层 AI 服务保障。自 2023 年全面开源以来，Qwen 已超越 Llama、Deepseek 等模型，成为全球性能最强、应用最广泛的开源大模型之一。

As of now, the global download volume of Qwen series models has exceeded 600 million, accumulating an extremely high industry reputation. Recently, Alibaba's flagship model Qwen3-Max, released by Alibaba, has surpassed international competitors such as GPT5 and Claude Opus 4 in performance, ranking among the top three globally. 截至目前，Qwen 系列模型的全球下载量已突破 6 亿次，积累了极高的行业声誉。近期，阿里发布的旗舰模型 Qwen3-Max，性能超越 GPT5、Claude Opus 4 等国际竞争者，跻身全球前三。

item.title: 《The Finals》国服正式上线，腾讯代理
item.guid: 《The-Finals》国服正式上线，腾讯代理
item.description:
The Chinese server version of the multiplayer online shooting game "The Finals," titled "Ultimate Showdown," officially launched yesterday, published by Tencent Games. 多人在线射击游戏《The Finals》国服版本《终极角逐》已于昨天正式上线，由腾讯游戏代理发行。

The overseas version of the game launched on Xbox Series X|S, PlayStation 5, and PC platforms in December 2023, attracting tens of millions of players in just two weeks. 该作海外版于 2023 年 12 月登陆 Xbox Series X|S、PlayStation 5 和 PC 平台，仅两周便吸引千万玩家关注。

The open beta of "Ultimate Showdown" on the Chinese server adopts a unique "cash-out mode" as its core gameplay. Players need to open vaults on the map, escort cash boxes to cash-out stations, and complete a countdown defense. Ultimately, the top two teams in wealth ranking win. Additionally, the game introduces a "fully destructible environment" mechanism, forcing players to abandon static defense and turn to dynamic engagement. 《终极角逐》国服公测采用独特的「提现模式」作为核心玩法。玩家需在地图中开启金库，护送钱箱至提现站并完成倒计时防守，最终以财富排名前二的队伍获胜。此外，游戏引入「全场景可破坏」机制，迫使玩家摒弃静态防御，转向动态博弈。

At the same time, the Chinese server version also launched multiple original designs, including special content like the "Cute Cat Set." On the WeGame platform, "Ultimate Showdown" entered the TOP3 of the popular games list with an 87.9% recommendation rate, supporting multiplayer online play and cross-platform account login. 同时，国服版本还推出多款原创设计，包括「可可爱爱猫猫套」等特色内容。 在 WeGame 平台，《终极角逐》以 87.9% 推荐率跻身火爆榜 TOP3，支持多人联机与跨平台账号登录。

item.title: 💡 高盛警告：AI 的繁荣早已在暗中标好了价格
item.guid: 💡-高盛警告：AI-的繁荣早已在暗中标好了价格
item.description:
According to Business Insider, Goldman Sachs analysts pointed out in a recently released research report that Wall Street's potential gains from AI technology have largely been reflected in stock market valuations in advance. 据《商业内幕》报道，高盛分析师在近日发布的研报中指出，华尔街对 AI 技术的潜在收益已在很大程度上提前反映在股市估值中。

Analysts warn that investors often face two major risks when confronted with innovation booms: "over-extrapolation" and "unsustainable profits." 分析师警告，投资者在面对创新热潮时往往存在「过度外推」和「利润不可持续」两大风险。

Goldman Sachs estimates that AI is expected to bring approximately $8 trillion in additional revenue to US companies, ranging between $5 trillion and $19 trillion, but without providing a specific timeframe. 高盛预计，AI 有望为美国企业带来约 8 万亿美元额外收入，区间在 5 万亿至 19 万亿美元之间，但未给出具体时间框架。

Meanwhile, since the launch of ChatGPT, the market capitalization of AI-related companies has increased by over $19 trillion, indicating that the market may have overdrawn some of the potential dividends. 与此同时，自 ChatGPT 推出以来，AI 相关公司市值已上涨超过 19 万亿美元，显示市场可能已透支了部分潜在红利。

The research report emphasizes that while individual companies may achieve astonishing profit growth in the short term, the overall market struggles to replicate this trend. Early productivity improvements can boost earnings, but as competition intensifies and capital investment increases, profit margins tend to erode. 研报强调，单个公司可能在短期内实现惊人的盈利增长，但整体市场难以复制这种趋势。早期生产力提升能够推高收益，但随着竞争加剧和资本投入增加，利润空间往往会被侵蚀。

Although Goldman Sachs did not directly define the current market as a bubble, it noted that valuation levels are "ahead of the macro story." Analysts believe that as long as the economy and AI investments remain strong, the market may continue to be optimistic, but if growth slows or the cycle reverses, high valuations will face risks. 尽管高盛没有直接将当前行情定义为泡沫，但指出估值水平已「超前于宏观故事」。分析师认为，只要经济和 AI 投资保持强劲，市场或将继续维持乐观，但若增长放缓或周期逆转，高估值将面临风险。

JPMorgan Chase analysts have also warned that current AI investments might repeat the path of the 1990s dot-com bubble: large amounts of capital invested, but a lack of clear understanding of the technology maturity curve. 摩根大通分析师也曾警告，当前 AI 投资可能重演 1990 年代互联网泡沫的路径：大量资金投入，但对技术成熟度曲线缺乏清晰理解。

item.title: 余承东展示华为 Mate X7 外观
item.guid: 余承东展示华为-Mate-X7-外观
item.description:
Yesterday, Richard Yu released a video showcasing the appearance of Huawei's new foldable phone, the Mate X7, and invited netizens to describe the product in four words. 昨天，余承东发布视频，展示华为新款折叠屏手机 Mate X7 外观，并邀请网友用四个字形容这款产品。

In the video, Richard Yu was wearing clothing made of Yunjin brocade, hinting that the new phone might adopt the same design language. 视频中，余承东身穿云锦材质服装，暗示新机或采用同样设计语言。

The appearance of the Huawei Mate X7 is similar to previously leaked versions, with a new design for the rear camera Deco. 华为 Mate X7 外观与此前曝光版本相似，后摄 Deco 采用全新设计。

According to Kuai Technology, citing online leaks, the Huawei Mate X7's inner screen measures 7.95 inches, with 2K resolution, and is equipped with UTG ultra-thin flexible glass. In terms of color options, the engineering machine offers five colors: Obsidian Black, Phantom Purple, Cosmic Red, Yunjin Blue, and Yunjin White. 据快科技援引网传爆料，华为 Mate X7 内屏尺寸为 7.95 英寸，分辨率为 2K，配备 UTG 超薄柔性玻璃。配色方面，工程机提供曜石黑、幻影紫、寰宇红、云锦蓝、云锦白五种配色。

Regarding core configuration, the Mate X7 will be equipped with the new Kirin 9030 processor, support the second-generation Hongfeng imaging system, and is positioned as the foldable phone with the strongest imaging capabilities currently available. 核心配置方面，Mate X7 将搭载全新麒麟 9030 处理器，支持第二代红枫影像系统，被定位为目前影像实力最强的折叠屏手机。

The testing solution includes a 50MP 1/1.56-inch and a 50-megapixel 1/1.3-inch dual main camera, supporting physical variable aperture, and equipped with a 50MP periscope telephoto macro lens and a Hongfeng multispectral camera. 测试方案包括 50MP 1/1.56 英寸与 5000 万像素 1/1.3 英寸双主摄，支持物理可变光圈，并配备 50MP 潜望长焦微距镜头及红枫多光谱摄像头。

The new phone will be released on November 25th, making its debut alongside the Mate 80 series. 新机将于 11 月 25 日发布，与 Mate 80 系列一同亮相。

item.title: 马斯克 xAI 推出 Grok 4.1：登顶 LMArena 榜单，挑战 ChatGPT
item.guid: 马斯克-xAI-推出-Grok-4.1：登顶-LMArena-榜单，挑战-ChatGPT
item.description:
Elon Musk's xAI officially released Grok 4.1 yesterday, now available on the Grok official website, X, Apple App Store, and Google Play. 埃隆 · 马斯克旗下 xAI 昨天正式发布 Grok 4.1，现已在 Grok 官网、X、苹果 App Store 与 Google Play 上线。

The xAI team stated that the new version has significantly improved in speed and quality compared to its predecessor, with a more acute perception of subtle intentions, more engaging conversations, and more consistent personality expression, while maintaining the intelligence and reliability of the previous generation. xAI 团队表示，新版在速度与品质方面较前代产品有显著提升，对细微意图的感知更为敏锐，对话更具吸引力，个性表现更连贯一致，同时保持了前代的智能水准与可靠性。

Grok 4.1 offers two modes: a thinking mode that supports deep reasoning, and a non-reasoning mode that provides instant responses without consuming tokens. Test data shows that the hallucination rate of the non-reasoning model has decreased from 12% in Grok 4 to 4.2%. Grok 4.1 提供两种模式：思考模式支持深度推理，非推理模式则无需消耗 token 即可即时响应。测试数据显示，非推理模型的幻觉率已由 Grok 4 的 12% 降至 4.2%。

In terms of performance evaluation, Grok 4.1 ranks first overall in the LMArena text leaderboard with an Elo score of 1483, while its non-reasoning mode also ranks second with 1465 Elo, surpassing the full reasoning configurations of other models. 在性能评估方面，Grok 4.1 在 LMArena 文本排行榜中以 1483 Elo 分数位居整体第一，非推理模式也以 1465 Elo 排名第二，超越其他模型的完整推理配置。

Furthermore, Grok 4.1 has demonstrated leading performance in both the EQ-Bench emotional intelligence test and the Creative Writing v3 benchmark, highlighting its strengths in emotional understanding and creative generation. 此外，在 EQ-Bench 情商测试与 Creative Writing v3 创意写作基准中，Grok 4.1 均展现出领先表现，凸显其在情感理解与创意生成上的优势。

Musk emphasized that users will "notice a significant improvement in speed and quality compared to the previous generation." 马斯克强调，用户将「注意到相较前代产品在速度和品质上的显著提升」。

Currently, Grok is used as a voice assistant in Tesla vehicles, and its main competitors include mainstream AI assistants such as OpenAI's ChatGPT, Google Gemini, and Microsoft Copilot. 目前，Grok 已在特斯拉车辆中作为语音助手使用，其主要竞争对手包括 OpenAI 的 ChatGPT、Google Gemini 以及微软 Copilot 等主流 AI 助手。

item.title: 安谋科技发布「周易」X3 NPU IP，端侧 AI 算力提升十倍
item.guid: 安谋科技发布「周易」X3-NPU-IP，端侧-AI-算力提升十倍
item.description:
Arm China yesterday held a new product launch event in Shanghai, officially unveiling its new generation NPU IP, "Zhouyi" X3. 安谋科技昨天在上海举行新品发布会，正式推出新一代 NPU IP「周易」X3。

This product adopts a DSP + DSA architecture specifically designed for large models, balancing CNN and Transformer, and working in conjunction with the comprehensive "Zhouyi" NPU Compass AI software platform. It aims to provide efficient AI computing cores for four major areas: infrastructure, smart vehicles, mobile terminals, and smart IoT, accelerating edge AI deployment. 该产品采用专为大模型设计的 DSP + DSA 架构，兼顾 CNN 与 Transformer，并协同完善的「周易」NPU Compass AI 软件平台，旨在为基础设施、智能汽车、移动终端及智能物联网四大领域提供高效 AI 计算核心，加速端侧 AI 部署。

In terms of hardware, "Zhouyi" X3 boasts 8-80 FP8 TFLOPS computing power, with a single core bandwidth of up to 256 GB/s. It supports W4A8/W4A16 computing acceleration modes and integrates self-developed WDC decompression hardware, which provides an additional approximately 15% equivalent bandwidth after large model weight compression. Its AIFF hardware engine and dedicated scheduler can reduce CPU load to 0.5%, significantly improving parallel task processing efficiency. 硬件方面，「周易」X3 具备 8-80 FP8 TFLOPS 算力，单 Core 带宽高达 256 GB/s，支持 W4A8/W4A16 计算加速模式，并集成自研 WDC 解压硬件，使大模型权重压缩后可获得额外约 15% 的等效带宽。其 AIFF 硬件引擎与专用调度器可将 CPU 负载降至 0.5%，显著提升并行任务处理效率。

Regarding performance, "Zhouyi" X3's CNN model performance has improved by 30%-50% compared to the previous generation, and its AIGC large model capabilities have increased tenfold. Actual test data shows that the computing power utilization rate reaches 72% during the Prefill stage, and the effective bandwidth utilization rate exceeds 100% during the Decode stage with WDC enabled, fully unleashing the hardware's potential. 性能方面，「周易」X3 CNN 模型性能较上一代提升 30%-50%，AIGC 大模型能力提升 10 倍。实测数据显示，Prefill 阶段算力利用率达 72%，Decode 阶段在开启 WDC 情况下有效带宽利用率超过 100%，充分释放硬件潜力。

The platform has open-sourced core components such as Parser, Optimizer, Linux Driver, and TVM, and supports the DSL operator programming language. Initially, it supports over 160 operators and more than 270 models, enhancing development and deployment efficiency. 平台已开源 Parser、Optimizer、Linux Driver、TVM 等核心组件，并支持 DSL 算子编程语言，初期已支持超 160 种算子与 270 多种模型，提升开发与部署效率。

item.title: 蚂蚁全模态 AI 助手「灵光」，主打 30 秒生成应用
item.guid: 蚂蚁全模态-AI-助手「灵光」，主打-30-秒生成应用
item.description:
Yesterday, Ant Group officially launched "Lingguang," a full-modal general AI assistant, with "generating applications in 30 seconds" as its core highlight. It is now available on the Android app store and Apple App Store. This product is aimed at general users, intending to provide a zero-threshold application development experience. 昨天，蚂蚁集团正式发布全模态通用 AI 助手「灵光」，以「30 秒生成应用」为核心亮点，现已在 Android 应用商店与苹果 App Store 上线。该产品面向普通用户，旨在提供零门槛的应用开发体验。

"Lingguang" possesses three major functions: "Lingguang Dialogue," "Lingguang Flash App," and "Lingguang Insight." 「灵光」具备三大功能：「灵光对话」、「灵光闪应用」与「灵光开眼」。

    "Lingguang Dialogue" breaks through traditional text-based Q&A models, supporting the generation of multi-modal content such as 3D models, interactive maps, and audio/video, making information presentation more intuitive;

    "Lingguang Flash App" can generate small applications like fitness plan tools, travel planners, and healthy recipe generators within 30 seconds to 1 minute, and supports custom parameters and sharing;

    "Lingguang Insight" is equipped with AGI camera technology, which can analyze and understand the physical world through real-time video streams, and supports creative modes such as text-to-image/video and image-to-image/video.

In recent years, Ant Group has accelerated its AGI deployment, launching AI medical butler AQ and the embodied intelligence project Lingbo Technology, and pushing the Ant Bailin large model into the trillion-parameter league. The launch of "Lingguang" further demonstrates Ant's full-chain capabilities in AI technology breakthroughs and scenario implementation. 近年来，蚂蚁集团加速 AGI 布局，已推出 AI 医疗管家 AQ、具身智能项目灵波科技，并推动蚂蚁百灵大模型进入万亿参数阵营。「灵光」的上线进一步展示了蚂蚁在 AI 技术突破与场景落地上的全链路能力。

item.title: 昆仑万维发布 Skywork R1V4-Lite：性能超越 Gemini 2.5 Flash
item.guid: 昆仑万维发布-Skywork-R1V4-Lite：性能超越-Gemini-2.5-Flash
item.description:
Yesterday, Kunlun Tech officially released its lightweight multimodal agent, Skywork R1V4-Lite, integrating visual operation, reasoning, and task planning capabilities. 昨天，昆仑万维正式发布轻量级多模态智能体 Skywork R1V4-Lite，集成了视觉操作、推理与任务规划能力。

This product emphasizes "completing complex tasks by simply taking a photo," unifying three major functions within the same model: active image manipulation, external tool invocation, and multimodal deep research. Its core advantages include: 该产品强调「随手拍照即可完成复杂任务」，在同一模型中统一了主动图像操作、外部工具调用与多模态深度研究三大功能，核心优势包括：

  • 主动视觉操作：支持裁切、放大、旋转、区域定位等操作，能够在复杂场景中进行几何修复与空间关系推理；
  • 多模态深度研究：通过联网搜索与推理结合，形成「搜索—推理—验证」闭环，在 mm-search 与 FVQA 等基准测试中超越 Gemini 2.5 Flash；
  • 任务链规划：可从单张图像出发，自动生成任务分解、工具选择与执行顺序，首次实现由视觉驱动的行动规划；
  • 工程优化：在响应速度、吞吐效率与成本控制方面表现突出，延迟约为 Gemini 2.5 Pro 的 1/19，吞吐量约为其 2 倍。

昆仑万维表示，R1V4-Lite 的成功验证了「图像操作 × 深度推理交织训练」的新范式，证明小模型也能在性能与多模态能力上逼近闭源大模型。公司同时透露，Skywork R1V4-Pro 已在筹备发布阶段。

🖥️ API： https://platform.skyworkmodel.ai/

💻 GitHub： https://github.com/SkyworkAI/Skywork-R1V

item.title: 连锁餐饮正在用炒菜机器人取代预制菜
item.guid: 连锁餐饮正在用炒菜机器人取代预制菜
item.description:
据 36 氪报道，连锁餐饮品牌正加速引入炒菜机器人，以应对预制菜风波带来的行业挑战。

报道指出，老乡鸡、小菜园等餐企已在数百家门店部署智能烹饪设备，歌尔、富士康等大厂也开始在食堂场景中使用机器人，以提升出餐效率并降低人力成本。

炒菜机器人通过精准控温、自动搅拌与智能投料系统，实现标准化作业，既保留中餐「锅气」风味，又显著提高出餐速度。

烹饪机器人企业智谷天厨 CEO 耿凯平透露，过去一个月咨询需求增长近 10 倍，显示行业对智能化厨房的接受度快速提升。

市场数据显示，一台售价约 6 万元的中型炒菜机器人，使用寿命可达 8 至 10 年，月均成本约 600 元。 相比传统厨师每月 8000 至 15000 元的薪资，企业可在生命周期内节省数十万元至百万元不等的运营开支。

在企业团餐场景中，机器人还配备智能调度系统，可实时监测菜品余量与人流分布，动态补餐，避免食材浪费。据实测，其浪费率可降低 70% 以上。

业内人士指出，随着消费者对预制菜的抵触情绪加剧，机器人现炒成为餐企兼顾效率与品质的更优解。

item.title: 京东客服回应 Plus 会员权益缩水质疑：需保持「良好消费习惯」
item.guid: 京东客服回应-Plus-会员权益缩水质疑：需保持「良好消费习惯」
item.description:
据新浪财经报道，部分京东 PLUS 会员近日反映，其在尝试兑换会员权益中的上门保洁服务时遭遇失败。

系统提示为「您近期未在京东消费过，请您养成良好购物习惯后过几日再来兑换」。这一提示引发用户不满，认为权益出现缩水，措辞也令人不适。

不少网友在社交平台吐槽称，即便月均消费超过 1000 元，仍被拒绝开通家居卡权益。 京东客服回应称，该特定权益目前仅面向保持「良好消费习惯」的用户，并建议会员「多下单」以满足条件。

事件在社交媒体引发广泛讨论，部分消费者质疑京东 PLUS 会员的价值与透明度，认为权益限制与宣传不符。

item.title: 平台全额承担，美团「防寒险」保障 300 万骑手
item.guid: 平台全额承担，美团「防寒险」保障-300-万骑手
item.description:
美团昨日宣布启动「冬季跑单守护行动」，为全国骑手提供 300 万份「防寒险」，并同步推出防寒物资与餐饮福利等多项保障措施。

该保险由美团全额承担 ，覆盖因低温、冰雪、大风等恶劣天气导致的医疗健康支出，骑手无需额外操作即可自动享有保障。

At the same time, Meituan will also adjust its delivery scope and time, automatically compensate riders for time during severe weather, and use algorithmic mechanisms to remove negative reviews caused by weather, thereby alleviating delivery pressure. 同时，美团还将对配送范围与时间作出调整，在恶劣天气下为骑手自动补时，并通过算法机制剔除因天气造成的差评，以减轻配送压力。

In addition, the platform has distributed nearly one million pieces of cold-weather supplies in 165 cities nationwide, including cotton coats, leather jackets, masks, gloves, knee pads, handlebar covers, and warm patches. Over 52,000 rider stations across the country have also been equipped with warm patches and hot drinks, with summer cold drink areas converted to winter hot drink areas, and emergency rescue and information desks open simultaneously. 此外，平台已在全国 165 个城市发放近百万件防寒物资，包括棉服、皮衣、口罩、手套、护膝、车把套及暖宝宝等。全国超过 5.2 万座骑手驿站也已配备暖宝宝与热饮，夏季冰饮区改为冬季热饮区，应急救援与咨询台同步开放。

Regarding dining benefits, Meituan has added partnerships with chain brands such as Pizza Hut, Yonghe King, and KFC, offering discounted meal sets ranging from 6.9 yuan to 9.9 yuan for riders. Meituan stated that it will launch more seasonal and regular safeguard programs in the future to enhance riders' work experience and life stability. 在餐饮福利方面，美团新增必胜客、永和大王、肯德基等连锁品牌合作，为骑手提供 6.9 元至 9.9 元的优惠套餐。美团表示，未来还将推出更多季节性与常态化保障方案，以提升骑手工作体验与生活稳定性。

This marks Meituan's further expansion of its coverage, following the full implementation of rider pension insurance subsidies and the "Critical Illness Care Program" earlier this month. 这是美团继本月初全面覆盖骑手养老保险补贴及「大病关怀计划」后，再次扩展保障范围。

item.title: 低价拍立得相纸拼团暴雷，被骗金额逾百万元
item.guid: 低价拍立得相纸拼团暴雷，被骗金额逾百万元
item.description:
According to China National Radio, several consumers recently reported that after participating in group purchases of instant camera paper and cameras on the WeChat mini-program "Pintuan Ya," they have not received their goods, and the "group leader" who initiated the group purchase has also gone missing. This model has frequently "exploded" in the second half of this year, with some consumers losing up to millions of yuan in total. 据中央广播电视总台中国之声报道，近日有多名消费者反映，在微信「拼团呀」小程序参与拼团购买拍立得相纸与相机后，迟迟未收到货物，发起拼团的「团长」也失联。 该模式在今年下半年频繁「暴雷」，部分消费者累计受骗金额高达百万元。

The report points out that "group leaders" typically form groups at prices below market value, attracting consumers to prepay, but ultimately deliver either low-value goods or no goods at all. Consumers face difficulties in protecting their rights, with inadequate complaint channels and even inability to verify the "group leader's" identity information. 报道指出，「团长」通常以低于市场价的方式组团，吸引消费者预付费用，但最终或收到低价值商品，或完全收不到货。消费者维权困难，投诉渠道不畅，甚至无法确认「团长」身份信息。

Peng Chao, an associate professor at Wuhan University Law School, emphasized that platforms unilaterally declaring non-responsibility in user agreements constitutes standard terms. If a platform knows or should know about actions infringing on consumer rights but fails to take measures, it shall be jointly and severally liable with the "group leader" according to law. 武汉大学法学院副教授彭超强调，平台在用户协议中单方面声明不承担责任，属于格式条款。若平台明知或应知存在侵害消费者权益行为而未采取措施，依法需与「团长」承担连带责任。

Hu Gang, Deputy Secretary-General of the Legal Committee of the Internet Society of China, pointed out that mini-program operators effectively act as online trading platforms and should verify the identity of "group leaders" and bear primary compensation responsibility in disputes. He warned that group buying is a high-risk prepaid consumption model, and consumers need to remain vigilant to avoid falling into scams due to low-price temptations. 中国互联网协会法工委副秘书长胡钢则指出，小程序运营方事实上扮演了网络交易平台的角色，应对「团长」进行身份核验，并在纠纷中承担先行赔偿责任。他提醒，拼团属于高风险的预付费消费模式，消费者需保持警惕，避免因低价诱惑而陷入骗局。

The report also suggests that regulatory authorities should include emerging group buying platforms within their scope of supervision, establish cross-departmental coordination mechanisms to prevent the risk of "group leaders absconding," and address issues such as suspected fraud and false advertising. 报道还建议监管部门将新兴拼团平台纳入监管范围，建立跨部门协同机制，防范「团长跑路」风险，并对涉嫌诈骗、虚假广告等问题进行整治。

item.title: 《顺流而上》昨日上映
item.guid: 《顺流而上》昨日上映
item.description:
Yesterday, China's first theatrical film on environmental law enforcement, "Upstream," premiered nationwide on People's Cinemas, simultaneously releasing its theme song MV "Light of Dawn" and official poster. 昨日，我国首部环保执法题材院线电影《顺流而上》在全国人民院线上映，并同步发布主题曲 MV《黎明的光》及官方海报。

The film is the first to bring a real case of promoting environmental violations into criminal law to the big screen, focusing on water pollution investigation and enforcement struggles. 该片首次将推动环境违法入刑的真实案件搬上银幕，聚焦水污染调查与执法博弈。

The story revolves around Lu Qingyun, the newly appointed deputy captain of the Environmental Protection Bureau's enforcement team. In his pursuit of pollution sources, he confronts resistance from illegal discharge enterprises and criminal gangs, fighting alongside his partner Zhao Shanhe. 故事围绕新任环保局执法支队副支队长陆青云展开，他在追查污染源头过程中直面非法排污企业与黑恶势力的阻力，并与搭档赵山河并肩作战。

item.title: 《百川东到海》全国上映
item.guid: 《百川东到海》全国上映
item.description:
The healing film "All Rivers Flow to the Sea" officially premiered yesterday on the National Art Film Alliance special line. 治愈电影《百川东到海》昨天正式登陆全国艺联专线。

The film centers on the young boy Xiaohai (played by Wu Panrui), who embarks on a journey to find his mother during summer vacation, experiencing a summer adventure with his companion Yuanyuan (played by Wang Haoyu). Director Wu Shuang shared her creative inspiration at the premiere, stemming from observations of local villages and lifestyles during a trip to the Gansu desert, which gives the film its authentic texture. 影片围绕少年小海（吴潘芮 饰）展开，他在暑假踏上寻母旅程，并与伙伴元元（王浩宇 饰）共同经历夏日冒险。导演吴双在首映礼上分享创作灵感，源于在甘肃沙漠旅行时对当地村落与生活状态的观察，影片由此呈现真实质感。

The film previously held its premiere in Beijing on November 17th, receiving unanimous praise from industry experts and audiences, hailed as a "soul-healing masterpiece." Set against a desert backdrop, the film explores growth and belonging through a child's perspective, making it a heartwarming work for the winter season. 该片此前在 11 月 17 日于北京举办首映礼，获得业内专家与观众一致好评，被赞为「治愈心灵之作」。影片以沙漠为背景，通过儿童视角探讨成长与归属，成为冬季档期中的一部温暖之作。

item.title: 毕赣新片《狂野时代》周六上映
item.guid: 毕赣新片《狂野时代》周六上映
item.description:
Bi Gan's art film "A Wild Era" will be released nationwide on November 22nd and is currently available for pre-sale. Yesterday, the film released its fifth chapter, the "Touch" trailer and dynamic poster. 毕赣执导的艺术电影《狂野时代》将于 11 月 22 日全国上映，目前正在预售中，影片昨日发布第五篇章「触觉」预告及动态海报。

The film's plot revolves around a "hypnotist" who, through the five senses of sight, hearing, taste, smell, and touch, embarks on a century-spanning dream. 该片剧情围绕「迷魂者」通过视觉、听觉、味觉、嗅觉、触觉五种感官，跨越一个世纪的幻梦展开。

In the latest trailer, Apollo, played by Jackson Yee, meets Tai Zhaomei, played by Li Gengxi, amidst a "doomsday" atmosphere. The trailer uses elements like fireworks, running, and shouting to convey feelings of freedom and passion. 最新预告中，易烊千玺饰演的少年阿波罗在「世界末日」氛围下与李庚希饰演的邰肇玫相遇，预告片以烟花、奔跑、呐喊等元素传递自由与热烈的情绪。
